      • setInvocation

        public void setInvocation(Invocation invocation)
        Description copied from interface: ServerListFilterExt
        Server list filter should be stateless. Since invocation has state information, you can't use it for next invocation. Please implement stateful filters very carefully.
        Specified by:
        setInvocation in interface ServerListFilterExt
